descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: accountcategorycode
options.description: Category to indicate whether the customer account is standard or preferred. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: accountratingcode
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

values.name: addresstypecode
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: businesstypecode
options.description: The legal designation or other business type of the account for contracts or reporting purposes. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: customersizecode
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: customertypecode
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: description
options.description: Additional information to describe the account, such as an excerpt from the company’s website

options.name: emailaddress1
options.description: The primary email address for the account

options.name: emailaddress2
options.description: The secondary email address for the account

options.name: emailaddress3
options.description: Alternate email address for the account

options.name: ftpsiteurl
options.description: URL for the account’s FTP site to enable users to access data and share documents

options.name: industrycode
options.description: The account’s primary industry for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: name
options.description: Company o business name

options.name: creditlimit
options.description: Credit limit of the account. This is a useful reference when you address invoice and accounting issues with the customer.

options.name: numberofemployees
options.description: Number of employees that work at the account for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis

options.name: paymenttermscode
options.description: The payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.displayName: Preferred Appointment Day Name or ID
options.name: preferredappointmentdaycode
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.displayName: Preferred Appointment Time Name or ID
options.name: preferredappointmenttimecode
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.displayName: Preferred Contact Method Name or ID
options.name: preferredcontactmethodcode
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: revenue
options.description: The annual revenue for the account, used as an indicator in financial performance analysis

options.name: sharesoutstanding
options.description: The number of shares available to the public for the account. This number is used as an indicator in financial performance analysis.

options.name: shippingmethodcode
options.description: Shipping method for deliveries sent to the account’s address to designate the preferred carrier or other delivery option. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: sic
options.description: The Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code that indicates the account’s primary industry of business, for use in marketing segmentation and demographic analysis

options.name: stockexchange
options.description: The stock exchange at which the account is listed to track their stock and financial performance of the company

options.name: telephone1
options.description: The main phone number for this account

options.name: telephone2
options.description: The second phone number for this account

options.name: telephone3
options.description: The third phone number for this account

options.name: territorycode
options.description: Region or territory for the account for use in segmentation and analysis. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: tickersymbol
options.description: Type the stock exchange symbol for the account to track financial performance of the company. You can click the code entered in this field to access the latest trading information from MSN Money.

options.name: websiteurl
options.description: The account’s website URL to get quick details about the company profile

options.name: yominame
options.description: The phonetic spelling of the company name, if specified in Japanese, to make sure the name is pronounced correctly in phone calls and other communications

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
returnFields
options.description: Fields the response will include. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

filters.name: filters

options.name: query
options.description: Query to filter the results. Check filters.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation IN ["delete", "get", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'accountId'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation IN ["get", "getAll"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'account' AND operation IN ["create", "update"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
